It would be permissible to keep the name Wahaab as it means one who gives generously and is not specific to Allah Ta?ala only. (Ahsanul Fataawa vol.9 pg.60)%0D%0A%0D%0A3. Allah Ta?ala has declared war against those involved in interest and Nabi [Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam] has mentioned that they are accursed. There are many other punishments mentioned in the Ahaadith. We are unaware of what is meant by ?the last words of Rasulullah [Sallallahu Alayhi Wasallam] concerning interest?.%0D%0A%0D%0A4. In order to translate the Qur?aan and explain its meaning, one needs to be suitably qualified.
